args.text:
Welcome to
GBStudio!

Have you seen my
cat anywhere?

He's by the house?
Thank you!
Meow!

I guess it was a
misunderstanding.

What is that guy
looking at?

Check out this
sweet duck!

It's dangerous to
go without docs.

Check out
gbstudio.dev/docs

Also, try moving
the rock outside.

Have you tried
using this radio?

Yeah it doesn't
fit does it?

But it's all I
have right now...

Add sprites to
assets/sprites

Add backgrounds to
assets/backgrounds

This room is
pretty empty.

Try to edit
house.png

Try to get the ice
block to the mark.

If you get stuck,
I'll reset it!
Success!

actors.notes:
I need to figure out how to do the combat.
Lines for that are in \raw files\words\first fight.txt

text:
* You're new to
the UNDERGROUND,
aren'tcha?

* Golly, you must
be so confused.

* Someone ought to
teach you how

* I guess little
old me will 
have to do!

args.text:
Ready?
Here we go!

customEvents.name: Set initial stats
customEvents.description: Sets the player's max HP, current HP, LV, and their starting gear to the initial values
